DOC.brief_summary: A post marketing, international, multicenter, observational, prospective, longitudinal study. The purpose of the study is to describe cervical dystonia sub-types with their injection protocols and response to BoNT-A.
DOC.brief_title: Factors Influencing Response to One BoNT-A Injection Cycle in Subjects Suffering From Idiopathic Cervical Dystonia
DOC.criteria: Idiopathic cervical dystonia TWSTRS severity score â‰¥ 15 At least a 12week interval between the last injection (BoNTA or BoNTB) and inclusion Written informed consent prior to collect the data Contraindications to any BoNTA preparations Secondary cervical dystonia Subject already been included in the study
